Class Vector2

extends java.lang.Object
    It's a class that represents a 2D vector

        Returns:

      • sum

        public Vector2 sum​(Vector2 vector)
        This function returns a new Vector2 object that is the sum of the current Vector2 object and the Vector2 object passed in as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        vector - The vector to add to this vector.
        Returns:
        A new vector with the sum of the two vectors.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A new vector with the subtracted values of the two vectors.
